title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia (like -103).  Platns.  Ships.  Bird.", 1853, probably May
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white on grey paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: Light silvery green-Large / bushes very beautiful / masses; again, at center left: seed; again, center right: Champan; and again, lower left:  seed when ripe brownish / nearly ripe reddish / Green naples yellow approaching / to green
description: Horizontal view at upper left of bushes and trees, at upper right a steamer and three views of a champan [covered canoe], and across the lower half five platn tops.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia (like -103).  Platns.  Ships.  Bird.", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite, brush and oxidized white on grey paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-846-a.
